name: Escape The Space Station
description:
This game was made for MiniJam 71: Puzzles with the restriction that it be of two genres.  This is a mix of adventure games, escape room puzzles, and a little bit of platforming.
You have just woken up from cryo storage to find everyone else on the station dead from micro meteors.  You must make you way through all the sealed bulkheads and to a ship, but things could go very wrong.

WASD to move

Left click to interact and read screens.

E to close the dialog window

This escape takes about one hour to complete.

I strongly recommend you have some scratch paper to write things down.

There is a leaderboard for fastest times at the end of the game.
